0.English Text: Your health app to monitor flu-like symptoms, connect to telehealth doctors in your area and discover resources close to you.
0.Chinese Traditional Text: 為您監測流感類症狀，聯繫附近網路醫生，和尋找周邊醫療資源的健康類應用程式。

6.English Text: CoronaTracker is designed to help you monitor your health and keep you informed during the COVID-19 crisis. CoronaTracker is not intended to be used or viewed as diagnosis or treatment of disease or other symptoms, including but not limited to COVID-19. The CoronaTracker app uses Blockstack to process and store your personal data. This means you have complete ownership and control over your personal information input into the CoronaTracker application. Any analytics or usage information that may be collected or shared from CoronaTracker app will be anonymized and carefully stored so that no one can connect any information that would identify you.
6.Chinese Traditional Text: 新型冠狀病毒追蹤器為您在疫情期間即時監控您的健康狀況，及時匯總疫情相關的有效資訊。但是，該追蹤器不能替代針對新型冠狀病毒肺炎及其他疾病的專業醫療診斷與治療。新型冠狀病毒追蹤器運用Blockstack技術處理及儲存您的個人資訊，這意味著您對輸入該程式的個人資訊擁有完全的所有權和控制權。從新型冠狀病毒追蹤器採集或共用的任何分析或使用資訊將被匿名化並嚴密儲存，以保證任何人無法通過這些資訊識別您的身份。

7.English Text: This application was made for the community, by the community to help you regain ownership of your health. By agreeing below, you are consenting to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
7.Chinese Traditional Text: 這款健康程式是由社區主導構建，並為社區大眾服務，以重建我們對自己健康的自主權。如果您同意以下內容，即表示您同意我們的條款和條件以及隱私權政策。

8.English Text: I have read the Terms and Conditions
8.Chinese Traditional Text: 我已閱讀了條款和條件。

9.English Text: I have read the Privacy Policy
